content: Good morning! I couldn't find another place to post this question, so forgive me if this is exactly the wrong place... I took the Chat and Data Captain training on Sunday and signed up for a shadow shift Saturday AM. Haven't received a confirmation or any further instruction. I know the zoom link is included in the google form. Will I be receiving more info, or should I just show up 15 min prior to phonebank start to observe the pre-brief?
Hi Stephanie, you'll receive an email the day before typically with the full instructions!
Awesome, Jared! Thanks so much for clarifying this.
You're welcome, and thank you for stepping up to help out with the VOTE team! It's very rewarding helping fellow volunteers! <:thankyou:1252806147396735057>
